7.45.text:
Today for the Talks
at Google series,

we have with us Lauren Mayberry,

14.62.text:

musical set at the end.

23.32.text:

26.14.text:

34.53.text:
of BBC'S Sound of 2013, an

38.40.text:
at South by Southwest,

42.42.text:
